main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright blinking object in the sky in Miles City, Montana on December 13, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately one hour around 1600 hours., The object was described as blinking or flashing a bright light., Analysts suggested the object might have been two mixing bowls stacked on top of each other., A second observer reported seeing a similar phenomenon from a different location., The conclusion leaned towards the object likely being a star, with no physical evidence found.
sighted object: a bright blinking object in the sky
witness description: a civilian resident from Miles City, Montana, and another civilian, possibly a teacher.
